Title: Lefteris Dimakopoulos
Actors: Nikos Georgakis, Maria Skoula, Nikos Orfanos
Plot: After years of estrangement, two best friends reunite at a New Year's Eve party. As they take a trip down memory lane, their bittersweet story unfolds: 15 long years of youthful ambitions, sacrifices, lost loves, and forgotten ide...
